problem_names:
lemma cont_edom[THEN cont_compose, simp, cont2cont]:
  "cont (\<lambda> f. edom f)"
translations:
lemma cont_edom[THEN cont_compose, simp, cont2cont]:
  "cont (\<lambda> f. edom f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y.
       chain Y \<Longrightarrow>
       edom (\<Squnion>i. Y i) = \<Union> (edom ` range Y)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>Y x.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y; (\<Squnion>x. Y x) x \<noteq> \<bottom>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>xa. Y xa x \<noteq> \<bottom>
 2. \<And>Y x xa.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y; Y xa x \<noteq> \<bottom>;
        (\<Squnion>x. Y x) x = \<bottom>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y x xa.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y; Y xa x \<noteq> \<bottom>;
        (\<Squnion>x. Y x) x = \<bottom>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
